Class RealEstate

  • java.lang.Object
    • designPatterns.Subject
      • gameContent.Space
        • spaces.Property
          • properties.RealEstate

  • public class RealEstate
extends Property
    A specific property, which represents real estate on which houses and hotels can be built. Note that has not details yet and needs to be implemented.
    Author:
    Ekkart Kindler, ekki@dtu.dk
